document.full_text: haley reinhart said on friday she was at peace with missing out on a spot in next week's "american idol" finale and predicted that teens scotty mccreery and lauren alaina would captivate the show's younger fans.
document.title: haley reinhart kind on harsh "american idol" judges
lines_and_colors: haley reinhart said on friday she was at peace with missing out on a spot in next week's "american idol" finale and predicted that teens scotty mccreery and lauren alaina would captivate the show's younger fans.
